name: CorelDRAW File
summary: A CDR file is a drawing created with CorelDRAW, a vector illustration and page layout design application included with CorelDRAW Graphics Suite. It typically contains vector image data, such as lines, paths, and colored shapes, but may also include text, tables, and digital effects. The CDR format is commonly used for documents, such as brochures, tabloids, letters, advertisements, postcards, webpages, and web banners.
